charges.charge_description: 18:922(G)(1).F POSSESSION OF A FIREARM BY A CONVICTED FELON (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment 235 months as to Count 1 and 60 months as to Count 2 to run concurrent; Supervised release 3 years as to each Count to run concurrent; Special Assessment $100.00 (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment 235 months as to Count 1 and 60 months as to Count 2 to run concurrent; Supervised release 3 years as to each Count to run concurrent; Special Assessment $100.00 (2)
